dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: That assist was a violation of corporate law if I ever saw one. Since it was to my benefit - and we're largely in lawless lands - I'll look the other way. C3 owes you one, stranger.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: You haven't seen Constance, have you? Ah, there's her torso. And that'd be her legs over yonder... Never mind. I'm Berthold.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: C3 sent me to find you.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: Means they're still holding the post then. Good. You might head on back.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: We can talk more there, where it's safe. I'll be on my way... once I've gathered up Constance's parts.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: Killing marauders and hooligans - as I am handsomely paid to do. 'Course, as me and Constance discovered, they ain't the only forms of life inhabiting these caverns.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: I owe you a debt for saving my neck, stranger. And I mean to pay it.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: There's a station up the way. It's where my C3's are posted.

dialog.speaker: Berthold Fox (Male)
dialog.utterance: It is. Going to be a mess to haul back. Hazard of the job, I reckon.
